description:
Being a professional voice actor is more than having a great voice. Rookie seiyuu Futaba Ichinose must learn about the hard work, determination, and heart that goes into being the voice behind beloved characters. The work is far from easy and nothing hurts more than the dreaded rejection call, but Futaba works through it to achieve her dream of becoming a big-time seiyuu - except she only has two years to prove to her agency that she's good enough to be one. Luckily, she's not alone! Ichigo Moesaki, a self-claimed princess from Planet Strawberry, and Rin Kohana, a seasoned professional since the age of five, will be at her side when they form the seiyuu unit, Earphones. But even being in a unit won't be enough to guarantee Futaba's success if she can't land more roles. Follow these three girls and learn just what it takes to be a professional voice actor.

(Source: Funimation)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hatakenjiro) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/hajimemashite_maru/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/15184753)

Kenjirou Hata is a Japanese manga author. He is notable for the creation of the series Hayate the Combat Butler. He likes to collect anime related items, such as figurines. He was once an assistant of [Kouji Kumeta](https://anilist.co/staff/97662/Kouji-Kumeta).  

He is married to the voice actress [Masumi Asano](https://anilist.co/staff/95077/Masumi-Asano).

**Height:** 163 cm

[Website](http://www.masumin.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masumi_asano) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/asano.masumi/)

Married to the mangaka [Kenjirou Hata](https://anilist.co/staff/100074).

[Official Website](http://earphones-official.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/earphone_seiyu) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJFiq8b262KUx2px_iIjaVw/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/6nH1MaNtYwXEuwdOZ1R75p?si=IMH84HTZQBii1-NI2V_jnA) | [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/us/artist/1016821474) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earphones_(band)) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/イヤホンズ)

Earphones is a Japanese idol group formed in 2015. Originally, a fictitious idol group consisting of three main characters from the anime [Seiyu's Life!](https://anilist.co/anime/21009/), Earphones soon became a real idol group, its three members the voice actresses responsible for their respective characters in the anime.

(Source: Wikipedia)

__Members:__
• [**Marika Kouno**](https://anilist.co/staff/119383/) (高野麻里佳) - Nickname: Marinka (まりんか) - Color: Blue - Birthday: February 22 - Position: Noise Beauty
• [**Rie Takahashi**](https://anilist.co/staff/119331/) (高橋李依) - Nickname: Rieri (りえりー) - Color: Yellow - Birthday: February 27 - Position: Sister Leader
• [**Yuki Nagaku**](https://anilist.co/staff/119370/) (長久友紀) - Nickname: Gakkyu (がっきゅ) - Color: Pink - Birthday: April 8 - Position: Strawberry Princess

__Albums:__
• **MIRACLE MYSTERY TOUR** - Released: November 21, 2015
• **Some Dreams** - Released: March 14, 2018
• **Theory of evolution** - Released: July 22, 2020

[Official Website](http://earphones-official.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/earphone_seiyu) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJFiq8b262KUx2px_iIjaVw/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/6nH1MaNtYwXEuwdOZ1R75p?si=IMH84HTZQBii1-NI2V_jnA) | [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/us/artist/1016821474) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earphones_(band)) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/イヤホンズ)

Earphones is a Japanese idol group formed in 2015. [Website](http://king-cr.jp/artist/horie/) | [Profile](https://www.vims.co.jp/talent_profile_detail.php?id=8) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/horieyui-blog/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/horieyui_staff) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yuihorie_official/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yui_Horie) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A0%80%E6%B1%9F%E7%94%B1%E8%A1%A3) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/4000.html) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/YuiHorieJP)

She is a voice actress and singer currently affiliated with vims. She hosts a radio show called "Horie Yui no Tenshi no Tamago" (堀江由衣の天使のたまご "Yui Horie's Angel Eggs") and is the founding member of the singing group, Aice5. She is also a member of the band Kurobara Hozonkai, with the name YUIEL. Her hobbies include shoulder massaging, reading and eating. She has been affectionately nicknamed "Hocchan" (ほっちゃん) by her Japanese fans.

**Non-anime roles:** 
- Faruzan - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Freesia - Memento Mori (VG)
- Miranda - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Maiden - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Wagon - Ressha Sentai ToQger (Tokusatsu)
- Mine Aomori - Blue Archive (VG)
- Cotton Cookie - Cookie Run: Kingdom (VG)
- Surtr - Arknights (VG)
- Ai-chan - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Charlotte Corday - Fate/Grand Order (VG)
__Naohiro Tafu__ is a Japanese producer and animation planner. He currently works for the company Movic.

An old-time animator behind many of [Oh! Production](https://anilist.co/studio/234/)'s works and arguably the studio's most famous animator.

Saida joined the studio soon after it was established in 1970. There he studied under [Kazuo Komatsubara](https://anilist.co/staff/129558/) and [Kouichi Murata](https://anilist.co/staff/191548/), quickly becoming one of the studio's star animators. [Gauche the Cellist](https://anilist.co/anime/1049/) was in part a vehicle for his skills, in which Saida single-handedly drew all of the key animation for the 63-minute film.

Afterwards he was involved as character designer and animation director in many of the '70s and '80s series that were imported to Europe, including World Masterpiece Theatre classics [Shoukoujo Sara](https://anilist.co/anime/2547/) and [Haha o Tazunete Sanzenri](https://anilist.co/anime/1663/).

He is still active to this day, working near exclusively on the long-running [Chibi Maruko-chan](https://anilist.co/anime/6149/) series.
Tomomi Umetsu is a Japanese director, episode director and editor.

Kozue Kananiwa graduated from the HOSEI University of Tokyo, Faculty of Letters, Department of Japan Literature. Her first work as a producer was for [Oh! My Goddess](https://anilist.co/anime/50/Aa-Megamisama-TV/) in 2005.

Since, she participated in the production many renown series such as [Mahou Shoujo Madoka☆Magica](https://anilist.co/anime/9756/Mahou-Shoujo-MadokaMagica/) in 2011, [Steins;Gate](https://anilist.co/anime/9253/SteinsGate) the same year, or more recently [Horimiya](https://anilist.co/anime/124080/Horimiya/).

Now, she is the General Manager of  both U-NEXT Anime & Book Division and of the Production Department.

(Source : Bangumi 番組計画RC3)
__Haruka Matsushita__ is a Japanese recording engineer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/editzhirose)** | **[Website](http://www.editz.jp/)**

**Hirose Kiyoshi** is a Japanese editor and film editor.
